original_text: The bases for the posts were bronze. The hooks and bands on the posts were silver, and their tops were overlaid with silver; so all the posts of the courtyard had silver bands.
korean_text: 기둥 받침은 놋이요 기둥의 갈고리와 가름대는 은이요 기둥 머리 싸개는 은이며 뜰의 모든 기둥에 은 가름대를 꿰었으며

sentences.original_text: The bases for the posts were bronze
The hooks on the posts were silver
The bands on the posts were silver
Their tops were overlaid with silver
All the posts of the courtyard had silver bands
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰의 모든 기둥들이 은 띠들을 가졌더라
